summary:
After 7+ years of driving sales and business development, in late 2021 I moved to a presales role. I'm honing in on my Engineering educational background & taking my passion for technology to help companies evaluate the right tools for growing businesses. If you wondering what the next best step after a sales role is, I'm happy to have a chat. 

My sales experience spans technology start-ups and SaaS companies like Tableau & OutSystems in Singapore & Dubai focusing on customer growth and building partner ecosystems across India, Singapore, Malaysia, the Phillippines, Hong Kong, and other emerging markets in Asia.

that included an online server, a talking PoS system along with a price display.

profile_positions.description:
- Looking after the business development for the South Asian region with a focus on India.
- Evangelising Low Code in an emerging market and educating them about using it to accelerate Digital Transformation goals.
- Participating and networking in events like road shows, trade conferences, jumpstarts and NextStep.
- Designing & executing outbound campaigns to targeted prospects to generate interested leads for the OutSystems sales team to close new business. 
- Responding to inbound interest from interested prospects, attaining key data to qualify the prospect, generate “sales ready” leads.
- Mapping and engaging with prospective accounts around organizational structure, people and existing technology.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager - India & South Asia

profile_positions.description:
Managing the Tableau Commercial business

- Representing Tableau and its product suite in new & existing customer accounts of all sizes and industries
- Managing all aspects of the sales process including lead generation, qualification, evaluation, close and account management
- Developing the sales pipeline, prospect and assess sales potential with the ability to move a large number of transaction or strategic business simultaneously through the sales pipeline
- Tracking customer and transactional information into web-based system; logging all sales activity within the established processes; keeping customer account current and accurate
- Coordinating with marketing & presales throughout the sales cycle, including product support and sales engineering
- Providing product demonstration to prospects and customers
profile_positions.title: Sales Area Manager - India

profile_positions.description:
Spaceship Storage is a full suite valet storage service that uses technology to make self storage affordable and personalized. It is well funded by prestigious VCs in Asia.

- Accelerated $150K+ sales within 7 months using a proactive sales strategy - storyboards for different customers, quick response time and iterative changes to the sales process.
- Launched new products to match the needs of the market & disrupt the self-storage industry while executing them with the operations and technology team.
- Created the UX for all products of Spaceship with equal weightage to online and offline – an ordering system emulating e-commerce sites and flawless customer service. 
- Implemented the digital marketing strategy through Facebook ads, Google ads, Social Media and eDMs and designing compelling, AB tested landing pages.
- Built a concurrent side project, Food Rockets delivering lunches from local eating spots to offices in the Central Business District of Singapore.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing & Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sugar is a lifestyle mobile app to discover new and exciting places to visit in Singapore, Hong Kong & Jakarta. Its raised over S$1 Million in funding.

- Acquired more than 90 merchants in the Singapore lifestyle sphere in a span of 6 months as a Business Development Associate.
- Designed the investment pack with focus on market research and data representation which was used in a fundraising round oversubscribed by Asia’s top tech investors.
- Created innovative marketing collaterals to match our brand identity and designed various elements of the app as a Creative Associate.
- Initiated marketing campaigns for user acquisition in the form of roadshows to garner more than 2.5K users over 2 days as a Marketing Associate.
profile_positions.title: Management Associate

profile_positions.description:
- Automated daily forecasting reports by writing scripts using AppleScript.
- Formulated reports and templates for supply and demand estimations.
profile_positions.title: Supply Demand Management - Decision Support Intern

profile_positions.description:
- Designed a branding video for the brand along with leadership profiling of the employees.
- Developed the technical aspects of the video to bring out the right essence of the brand.
profile_positions.title: Media Intern

profile_positions.description:
- Assisted in copy writing, scheduling & testing of ‘SnapAnEvent’ online competition.
- Analysed and reported the web traffic of Google Adwords, Facebook Ads through Google Analytics.
- Designed and gave feedback on mockups for the website along with the Chief Designer.
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Intern
